name: Spicy
description: Turn up the heat with daring challenges

prompts.text: %s, share your most awkward date story or take 3 drinks
%s and %s, maintain eye contact for 30 seconds. First to look away drinks!
%s, let the group look through your camera roll for 30 seconds or take 4 drinks
%s, text your crush 'hey' or take 3 drinks
%s, reveal your screen time or drink!
%s and %s, swap phones for 1 minute or both drink 2
%s, do a dramatic reading of your last sent message
%s, let %s post anything to your social media story or drink 4
Hot Seat! %s is in the hot seat. Everyone asks them one spicy question!
%s, describe your type without naming anyone in the room
Everyone who has texted an ex in the last month, drink!
%s, give your phone to %s. They send one text to anyone!
Accent Round! Everyone must speak in an accent of their choice!
prompts.secondary: Accent Round is over! Back to normal voices.

prompts.text: %s, show the last photo you took or drink 3
Most Likely To! %s picks a scenario. Point at who's most likely. Majority drinks!
%s, call someone and tell them you love them or drink 3
%s rates %s on a scale of 1-10. Rating under 7 = both drink!
Everyone who has ghosted someone drinks!
%s, tell us your biggest ick or drink 2
%s and %s link arms and drink together!
